messages.title: STANDING UP FOR YOU
messages.content: As a postal voter you clearly value the importance of parliamentary democracy. So do I.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Caroline Lucas wants to shake up Westminster, hold the Government to account, and ask the difficult questions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Although the Labour Party is trying to frighten voters into voting for them, the evidence is clear a nondependent poll has put Caroline 10% ahead of Labour.

issues.governance: Caroline Lucas wants to shake up Westminster, hold the Government to account, and ask the difficult questions thereby better representing your views in Parliament.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a strong independent-minded Green MP, I would be free from order of Party Whips and red-tape rich donors. A vote for me is a vote that dares to be different, replacing the politics of fear with the politics of hope.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Caroline will not prop up a Conservative government or push a Labour one to be more progressive.
